name: web-project-cli
description: A commandline tool to create simple project structure for html project

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'upgraded to %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'upgraded to %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'upgraded to %s' && git push && git push --tags

author: dharmendra
